content: the yarn in back slip the second 5 stitch on the left-hand needle purlwise without dropping it from the needle knit through the front loop of the first stitch 4 on your left-hand needle drop both the first and second 3 stitches off the left-hand needle 2 wrap and knit 2 wk2 bring yarn to front slip 2 purlwise 1 from left-hand needle to the right-hand needle bring yarn to back slip 2 purlwise from the right-hand needle back to the repeat 3 times left-hand needle knit 2 stitches need help with these stitches check out this tutorial https //youtu be/f6g3q2r6afe chart a - written round 1 * knit 3 lsc rsc knit 3 repeat from * twice more round 2 * knit 4 wk2 knit 4 repeat from * twice more round 3 * knit 3 rsc lsc knit 3 repeat from * twice more round 4 knit all round 5 knit all round 6 knit all round 7 knit 2 * knit 6 lsc rsc repeat from * once more knit 8 round 8 knit 2 * knit 7 wk2 knit 1 repeat from * once more knit 8 round 9 knit 2 * knit 6 rsc lsc repeat from * once more knit 8 round 10 knit all round 11 knit all round 12 knit all chart b - written round 1 * lsc rsc knit 6 repeat from * twice more round 2 * knit 1 wk2 knit 7 repeat from * twice more round 3 * rsc lsc knit 6 repeat from * twice more round 4 knit all round 5 knit all round 6 knit all round 7 * knit 5 lsc rsc knit 1 repeat from * twice more round 8 * knit 6 wk2 knit 2 repeat from * twice more round 9 * knit 5 rsc lsc knit 1 repeat from * twice more round 10 knit all round 11 knit all round 12 knit all short row heel techniques knit double-wrapped stitch on right side slip 1 purlwise from left-hand needle to the right-hand needle with the tip of the left-hand needle pick up the two wraps around the slipped stitched slip 1 purlwise from right-hand needle back onto left-hand needle knit the stitch and two wraps together knit wrapped stitch on right side slip 1 purlwise from left-hand needle to the right-hand needle with the tip of the left-hand needle pick up the wrap around the slipped stitched slip 1 purlwise from right-hand needle back onto left- hand needle knit stitch and wrap together make 1 left m1l insert left-hand needle from front to back under the yarn running from the first stitch on the left-hand needle and the last stitch on the right-hand needle knit this stitch through the back loop 1 stitch increased make 1 right m1r insert left-hand needle from back to front under the yarn running from the first stitch on the left- hand needle and the last stitch on the right-hand needle knit this
